title: BitcoinSoloMiner
author: BitcoinSoloMiner
content: Is it a good deal?They're supposed to be newChina --> UKWould mean 20% tax on top + feesSo about 1200 all in for 1

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Yes, it's a good deal but We don't know if it's new you are dealing with an unknown seller there is a big chance that the seller is a scammer or you will receive a unit with some issues.So it's risky to deal with them unless you buy it directly from Bitmain.If you want a cheap units with near or same hash rate speed then check Canaan units they are still selling cheap units like a1246-96T you can check them here below - https://shop.canaan.io/

comments.author: BitcoinSoloMiner
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on December 20, 2022, 04:28:19 PMYes, it's a good deal but We don't know if it's new you are dealing with an unknown seller there is a big chance that the seller is a scammer or you will receive a unit with some issues.So it's risky to deal with them unless you buy it directly from Bitmain.If you want a cheap units with near or same hash rate speed then check Canaan units they are still selling cheap units like a1246-96T you can check them here below - https://shop.canaan.io/Its through amazon marketplace so there's the amazon buyer guaranteeI would go with Canaan but even with their sales its still expensive compared to bitmain

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinSoloMiner on December 20, 2022, 04:45:55 PMIts through amazon marketplace so there's the amazon buyer guaranteeI would go with Canaan but even with their sales its still expensive compared to bitmainDid you check carefully the price of units from Canaan? I think you didn't check carefully the price from Bitmain and Canaan Shop unless you talking about 3rd party shops like amazon?We talking about the price of their units directly to the manufacturer's price between Canaan and Bitmain Shop you should see a big difference.

comments.author: BitcoinSoloMiner
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on December 20, 2022, 11:21:17 PMQuote from: BitcoinSoloMiner on December 20, 2022, 04:45:55 PMIts through amazon marketplace so there's the amazon buyer guaranteeI would go with Canaan but even with their sales its still expensive compared to bitmainDid you check carefully the price of units from Canaan? I think you didn't check carefully the price from Bitmain and Canaan Shop unless you talking about 3rd party shops like amazon?We talking about the price of their units directly to the manufacturer's price between Canaan and Bitmain Shop you should see a big difference.The canaan are less efficient and cost morebitmain s19 pro $1950 100T 2950WAvalon Miner A1246 $1728 96T 3420W orAvalon Miner A1346 $2461 107T 3300Wbitmain is better option
